title: GitHub Storage Test Entry
description: This is a test entry to validate GitHub Issues storage integration.

context.businessContext: Testing GitHub storage functionality to ensure it works correctly with real GitHub repositories.
context.technicalContext: Uses the GitHub Issues API to store devlog entries as structured GitHub Issues with proper labels and metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: Entry appears as a GitHub Issue
Labels are created and applied correctly
Metadata is stored properly in issue body
Entry can be retrieved and updated
